data.name: دوکواد
data.description: DevQuad Group is -based in North Cyprus- a holding consisting of four companies (sectors), specialised in Technology, Art, Import & Export and Construction. Each company has a team of experts in the field.  Our sector-focused businesses give our clients access to incomparable experience, global best practice and market-leading innovation and the specialist skills of our people who work in and understand our clients' industries. These businesses are recognised market leaders in their field.
